markdown: # The best thing between two sandwiches. Soft drinks go with all kinds of sandwiches. Round ones, square ones, fat ones and lean ones. Not only do they quench large thirsts in a fun way; they also help balance the diet. After all, healthy bodies need 5 to 6 glasses of water a day. Soft drinks contain the purest, filtered water. So sandwich soft drinks among your sandwiches. And celebrate National Sandwich Month every month in the year. For information on soft drinks and the balanced diet, write: <::Logo: The letters "NSDA" in a bold, sans-serif font, with a striped background, positioned in the top right corner of the image.::> NATIONAL SOFT DRINK ASSOCIATION 1128 SIXTEENTH ST., N. W., WASHINGTON, D. C. 20036 <::Image: A vertical stack featuring two large submarine sandwiches (subs) and a glass bottle of soft drink. The top sandwich is positioned horizontally, with a small decorative pick inserted into it. Below the top sandwich, a glass bottle of soft drink is placed horizontally, with its label partially visible, reading "SOFT D". Below the bottle, another large submarine sandwich is placed horizontally.::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/qqvf0227
